function.name: nba_games_and_stats_for_a_single_player_for_tank01_fantasy_stats
function.description:
This is the subfunction for tool "tank01_fantasy_stats", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "This call will grab a map of all of the games a player has played in the season.     
playerID is a required parameter.
You can also use gameID if you want to only pull back a specific game. 
season is an optional parameter.  Currently only 2022 (last seas"

numberofgames.description: use this to restrict the results to the most recent numberOfGames you give here for the parameter

season.description:
season in format YYYY
defaults to current season if gameID is not listed

gameid.description: use this to restrict the results to the boxscore for only one game of this player.  This increases the speed of the call.

function.name: get_teams_for_tank01_fantasy_stats

function.name: get_daily_schedule_for_tank01_fantasy_stats

call is like this:
